sentences.sContent: Crystal clear waters, beautiful white sand beaches, swaying palm trees and fabulous dive sites – that’s why the Maldives, is known for being one of the best tropical holiday destinations in the world.
sentences.sContent_eng: Crystal clear waters, beautiful white sand beaches, swaying palm trees and fabulous dive sites – that’s why the Maldives, is known for being one of the best tropical holiday destinations in the world.
sentences.sCn: 清澈透明的海水，美丽的白色沙滩，摇曳生姿的棕榈树，难以置信的的潜水胜地——这就是马尔代夫被誉为世界上最佳热带地区度假地之一的原因。

synos.tran: 难以置信的；传说的，寓言中的；极好的

remMethod.val: fab(看作fable， 寓言) + ulous → 寓言式的

trans.tranCn: 寓言般的；惊人的，难以置信的
